titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University. MS Or 54: Līlāvatī.

msContents.summary: Translation by Abū al-Fayz̤ ibn Mubārak Fayz̤ī of a famous work in Sanskrit on geometry and arithmetic.

persName.#text: Fayz̤ī, Abū al-Fayz̤ ibn Mubārak, 1547 or 1548-1595

supportDesc.extent: 75 foliated leaves : 185 x 120 (140 x 85) mm, bound to 190 x 130 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in taʻliq in black ink, pointed.

decoNote: Rubrications in red. Some geometrical figures (f. 52r-52v, 55r, 58v, 59r-60v, 61r, 62r-62v, 63v, 68r, 69r-71v) and tables (f. 7v-9r) in red.

binding.p: Half binding of black textile with floral printed brown paper sides.
